text: The Director of DDOT is authorized to organize the personnel and property transferred herein within any organizational unit of DDOT as the Director deems appropriate.
historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 15-354 substituted "DDOT" for "DOT".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law14-137, see notes following § 50-921.01.

For Law 15-354, see notes following § 50-319.

DC CODE § 50-921.07

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Motor and Non-Motor Vehicles and Traffic. (Refs & Annos)
